data.name: Climbtime Demo
data.detailed_description:
Game supports gamepad. Note for the demo version only the first level is available.

Game goals/modes
The game currently has five modes
  • Climb
    time-attack - reach the highest block(the one with a blue spinning cube over it same as the one at the base) as quickly as possible.

  • Fly(Vive only)
  • Glide(gamepad/keyboard)
    time-attack - destroy(by making contact) all 10 cores(the spinning/pulsing red orbs) at each floating block as quickly as possible

  • Crystal Hunt
    Find and collect(using the crystal shot) all 10 hidden crystals in the tower. The crystals are small blue cubes and create a sound which grows louder as you get nearer.

  • Explore
    Fly, glide or long-distance teleport over the terrain and enjoy the views which are modeled on the below real-world mountain and canyon terrains. More content to find in this mode coming.

    • Great Smoky Mountains, USA
    • Castle Valley, Utah, USA
    • Yosemite, USA
    • Grand Canyon, USA

See in-game pause menu(start button, F1) for settings, Controls, Game modes and additional notes.

Note that game engine graphics and input config options can be accessed by holding down shift or alt or ctrl key while starting the game.

Credits:
Music for levels 2,4,6,8 by Talon Vick

data.short_description: Climbtime - jump and parkour climb up procedurally generated levels for best self or leaderboard time to the top. Fly(Vive controllers only) and glide to destroy cores also for leaderboard times. Hunt down small crystals within the level in crystal hunt mode or explore the real-world based terrain.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2 / 7 SP1 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Core i3 / AMD A6 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Core i5 / AMD FX 2.4Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 / AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
